Description: Turn coffeemachine on. Place cup in machine. Press button to make coffee.
Place dishes in sink. Put detergent on dishsponge. Use dishsponge to scrub dishes. Rinse dishes. Put dishes into cabinet.
Take the knife and cut the apple in the plate
take the bread make a toast in toaster
Take the egg and fry the egg in bowl

Take pot to sink and add water. Put pot on stove. Turn on gas burner with stove knob. Boil water. Cut tomato into slices with knife. Add tomato slices into boiling water and cook further. Pour soup into bowl.

Take pot to sink and add water. Put pot on stove. Turn on gas burner with stove knob. Boil water. Cut lettuce into pieces with knife. Add lettuce to boiling water in pot and cook. Pour soup into bowl.
Take the pot and boil the water in gas burner
Go to bin, open bin and throw cracked egg.
clear the wastage of fruits,vegetables and other items in the fridge
Slice the potatoes and keep it in the Microwave till it cooks.
Search for the wine cup, take the wine bottle and then pour it in it.
Keep all the food outside into the fridge
Take a cup and pour water in it by keeping under the water tap.
On the stove and keep the potato sliced into a pot and boil it.
Search the apples in the fridge or in the fruit box and throw it into bin if it is unused.
After drying the utensils keep it one by one in the drawer of the kitchen cupboard.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_13_4
Description: Take the cup with coffee to the sink, and pour it away
Take the water pot and pour away the water from it .
Switch off the lights of the kitchen.
Go to the table in front of the couch and pick up the laptop, open it and turn it on.
Go to the couch. Pick up the remote from the cushion. Point the remote to the TV and turn it on.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_203_4
Description: Go to the table in front of the couch. Pick up the watch and look at it.
Go to the long table and pick up the phone and the book. Put them in the box.
Get the used tissue box. Take it to the bin and put it in.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_203_4
Description: Go to the lamp. Turn the lamp off.
Find the phone on the long table and throw it on the floor until the screen cracks.
Go to the long table. Get the phone. Pick it up. Start using it.
Go to the sofa. Take the remote off of it.
Go to the long table. Sit in one of the chairs. Grab the book. Open it and start reading.
